metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Consideration is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Consideration has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Mixolydian,  and C Dorian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
